name: PeaceVille
description:
For Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

The Theme was Rewind.

The Game

You are a citizen of the quiet town of PeaceVille. However a terrible accident occurs. Thankfully time rewinds itself for some reason, to give you a fighting chance. Use the time you have before 11:00 AM to save the town.

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Camera (In the Open World): Mouse

Interact: E or Space

Pause or Return: Enter or Escape

I tried to get a working WebGL version, but since its a third person camera, it glitches out, sorry.

I spent a bit too much time on this and there was a lot more I wanted to add. May add more things to it after the jam is over.
